answers.answer: Water u can't have but u should be able to use the bathroom
I was able to drink water. Only little sips of it
you'll be able to drink some water after they do the blood work it should be about 30 minutes after drinking whatever they gave you
And by the way you could use the bathroom so go ahead

question: I'm at the doctor's right now just got done drinking the juice for my diabetes test. It was soooo sweet all i want now is some water. (Which i can't have) And I have to use the bathroom now. Oh and they're giving me the tdap shot today :/
title: diabetes test
